protein.specific_function: Links covalently the heme group to the apoprotein of cytochrome c (By similarity).

reference.reference_text: Schaefer L, Ballabio A, Zoghbi HY: Cloning and characterization of a putative human holocytochrome c-type synthetase gene (HCCS) isolated from the critical region for microphthalmia with linear skin defects (MLS). Genomics. 1996 Jun 1;34(2):166-72.
